Text: Security access Cc Attached is the list of employees who should be allowed access to ECS on Sunday afternoon to test trading applications and for access to the Office of the Chair Thanks Tammy

remote offices Cc We have asked EPSC to pay the following leases for the month of January based on feedback from ENA commercial leadership My understanding is that we may still reject these leases under the bankruptcy if we do so by Feb I will revisit the status of these leases with you before February rents are to be paid Calgary Portland San Francisco Chicago Denver I have also been contacted by Paula Corey who is working on the enterprise strategy for the retrieval and disposition of remote office contents in the event any of these offices are closed I will keep you posted on the recommendations Regards Tammy

Remote Office Lease Paymentspst Louise Enron Property has asked me to validate whether some of the remote office leases should be paid for January I have been unable to get an answer about the Denver office Will you please advise We will still be able to reject the lease even if we pay the January rent if we do so by Feb under the bankruptcy rules Thank you Tammy

FW Master Planpst Louise Don has pushed this to Fallon Tammy Original Message From Miller Don Asset Mktg Sent Sunday January PM To Shepperd Tammy R Subject RE Master Plan Tammy I have approx people principally on but some remain on I believe it will tough if not impossible to move everyone by Tuesday I have no idea where Jim Fallon is planning on putting his wholesale group I have forwarded this email to Jim and anticipate that he will deal with it Thanks Don Original Message From Shepperd Tammy R Sent Friday January PM To Miller Don Asset Mktg Cc Bubenko Deborah Duree Janelle Subject FW Master Plan Importance High Don I am working on the space plan for NETCO I need a bit of assistance to identify the estate folks that are currently seated on either or Due to the short lead time I am on a rather tight leash Phase one of the project would require moving the estate people either to another ECS floor or perhaps to ECN We would potentially schedule these moves for Tuesday evening Please advise as soon as possible the names and preferred location ECS or ECN for your estate team Thanks in advance for your help Tammy x Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Monday December AM To Shepperd Tammy R Cc Colwell Wes Lavorato John Subject Master Plan Just when you thought it was safe We need to start working on getting everyone together who is in Netco in time for the sale of the company The ideal move time would be either this weekend or the next The idea is that everyone resides on and in the new building HR has the most up to date list of who all of the people are But essentially the organisation is just a smaller version of what we have today All commercial people on noncommerical on We would need to plan for an office to be created in the room next to mine but hold off on implementing that piece As the credit group is already here in the room next to mine it would be really good to move them first so they do not have to move back to the old building and then back Thanks

Draft th floor layout Cc Attached is the first draft of the th floor plan If you are fundamentally in agreement with the locations of these groups well ask department leads to put final names on seats The th floor would accomodate IT Accounting and Energy Ops excluding logisticsscheduling Phase one will include moving estate people off the floors best case TuesWeds pm Phase two will include moving the people already on these floors to new locations best case WedsThurs Phase three will include moving people from the Enron North building over best case to be determined Regards Tammy
GencoROCpst Louise Do you want Lloyd and Fred to obtain construction drawings CDs so that a project estimate can be generated on the ROC The CDs will run between Thanks Tammy
Security access Cc Attached is the list of employees who should be allowed access to ECS on Sunday afternoon to test trading applications and for access to the Office of the Chair Thanks Tammy

RE GencoROCpst Perhaps I should rephrase Do you wish for any work to continue on the ROC at this time or shall we put it on the back burner for a couple of weeks If the ROC is to be operational in early any further efforts towards the project will begin to incur external costs Lloyd and Fred are working on a management briefing for you Tammy Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Thursday November PM To Shepperd Tammy R Subject RE GencoROC Absolutely not We never did this on any of the other stuff Original Message From Shepperd Tammy R Sent Thursday November PM To Kitchen Louise Subject GencoROC Louise Do you want Lloyd and Fred to obtain construction drawings CDs so that a project estimate can be generated on the ROC The CDs will run between Thanks Tammy

FW Oct ECS th floorpst Louise I sent these out last night per Johns instructions I have been receiving updates all morning Churns need to be completed this week for the project team to remain on schedule These are the most up to date if I have received an update I have indicated it with c by the group name Original Message From Shepperd Tammy R Sent Wednesday October PM To Will Lloyd Arora Harry Kroll Heather Llodra John Forster David Sturm Fletcher J Davis Dana Neal Scott Vickers Frank W Curry Mike Gilbertsmith Doug Baughman Edward D Tycholiz Barry Grigsby Mike Arnold John Luce Laura Shively Hunter S Herndon Rogers Redmond Brian Lagrasta Fred Roberts Mike A Gaskill Chris Presto Kevin M Duran W David Cc Winfrey Christa Black Tamara Jae Rode Tina Belsha Lorie Smith Carli Duree Janelle Schoppe Tammie FinnelsNeal La Donna Rangel Ina Lopez Susan Subject Oct ECS th floor Importance High If you are on this distribution you have been identified by John and Louise as the responsible party for signing off on the ECS th floor Your assistants and other key people have done a great job of managing the floor plans so far and were on the home stretch John made some group location changes today and a final reviewupdate is required before churns are submitted this week Please take a moment to review the locations of your people and place them in the appropriate seats within your group best printed on x paper Note that desks and will not be available on Day temporary replacement seats are assigned in the lower right hand of the spread sheet if the lag time will be over two weeks Kindly return this at your earliest convenience on Thursday confirming your approval of the names and seat assignments I am also including the most current version of the th floor for your information Call me if you have any questions and thank you Tammy x Tina T Jae Ina La Donna Please be sure the IT tab has been filled in to facilitate the IT audit for Susan Lopez If I have left someone off this distribution please forward it on

FW INFO Please Read Feb Churnpst WesLouise Given that the lists are not final I find it difficult to expect that we can make a deadline of Monday at Are you willing to consider the churn on Feb Please advise ASAP Thanks Tammy Original Message From Cox Paige Sent Friday January AM To Shepperd Tammy R Cc Elliott Clay Duree Janelle Sustaita Dolores Link Kathy Adamik Darren Subject INFO Please Read Feb Churn Importance High Tammy Janelle and I met this morning regarding the churn for ECS et al In order to be able to meet the deadline of next weekend we will have to have all churns submitted no later than Monday January pm We will not be able to allow any addschanges past that point Should we be unable to meet the deadline at on Monday we will need to look at pushing back a week One option might be if all churns arent submitted on time to move all non UBS people off of ECS on the weekend and then shuffle every eon else the following thanks call me if you have any questions spc S Paige Cox Director Global Infrastructure Enron Net Works office cell

Clean up Cc Tammie Many of the desks on have items inon them that need to be boxed up and labeled and put in storage We need to have them cleaned up prior to moving new people to these locations ASAP Can you please help identify a task force Thanks Tammy
Furniturepst Louise Do you anticipate needing one more set of OOC executive furnishings or will satisfy us Thanks TRS

FW Oct ECS th floorLouise I sent these out last night per Johns instructions I have been receiving updates all morning Churns need to be completed this week for the project team to remain on schedule Out of Office AutoReply Master PlanI will be out of the office until Weds January If you have an urgent request I can be reached by cell phone at

RE New York Cc Ill get with my UBS contacts and find her a permanent place Im working on McDonald as well Tammy Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Wednesday February PM To Milnthorp Rob Cc Calger Christopher F Abramo Caroline Forster David Shepperd Tammy R Subject RE New York Agreed sorry I had thought Lavo sorted this out As we understand Caroline wants to work in Manhattan and therefore we need to look at those offices Tammy Shepperd is the person to contact Tammy can you please sort out Caroline same issues as Mike McDonald but New York Original Message From Milnthorp Rob Sent Wednesday February AM To Kitchen Louise Cc Calger Christopher F Abramo Caroline Forster David Subject New York Louise I talked in detail with Caroline this am We need to identify where Caroline is going to reside I understand that UBS has two operations in NY I think you and Hutchins need to decide what makes the most sense ie synergies It is critical that we get this resolved so that Caroline has some infrastructure around her

RE The lawyers are movingpst Please confirm one pc and two screens or pc and three screens Thanks Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Wednesday February PM To Shepperd Tammy R Subject The lawyers are moving Can you make sure Marcus Nettelton has three screens One pc and two screens Thanks Louise Kitchen Chief Operating Officer Enron Americas Tel Fax

FW New building seatsJohn You agreed to the original request below I received a request from Jill Zively today for more desks for the midmarket group below This will completely consume the desks Don was allocated Please advise They want to move on Nov Thanks Tammy Original Message From Dietrich Janet Sent Wednesday September AM To Shepperd Tammy R Cc Colwell Wes Lavorato John Black Don Subject New building seats Tammy we need to be sure that the sales folks sitting at the EES Gas Desk are also moved along with the rest of the desk to the new building These guys are responsible for rollover dealsretail midmarkettype transactions etc and need to be sitting with our gas desk If there is any issue with this call me Thanks
Move Information Cc A couple of questions Will you need to keep an office here after Friday At what time can the move team begin your move on Friday evening Thanks

War RoomsJohn The rooms will be available in the morning One room has PCs set up a printer and a fax and a lucent phone The other room has pcs a polycom and a lucent phone and marker board The copiers on the floor are functioning The trading desks we discussed have live lucent phones on them and the numbers will be on the phones so they can be given out if necessary If we need to have pcs installed at those desks we can do that later I will walk over first thing and make sure everything is functioning and gather the phone numbers Tammy
Security access Cc Attached is the list of employees who should be allowed access to ECS on Sunday afternoon to test trading applications and for access to the Office of the Chair Thanks Tammy

Post move changes Cc As we expected people are finding that the placement of people is not meeting all their needs I plan to meet with Presto Duran and Arnolds folks next Tuesday Nov to review potential changes I will prepare a strawman and let you guys have a look and give your approval at that time Any approved changes to the current configuration will be scheduled for Friday Nov Regards Tammy

Commercial estate Cc Attached is the th floor excel file to be able to assign seats for the estate churn The churn date will be Thursday Jan Fallons team has asked that the desks be assigned in sequential order Can you guys divide the list and get a churn in by noon tomorrow for the guys I sent you earlier Please They should only be churning phones turrets dont leave the floor CPUs boxes palms etc Key board and mice should remain here If there are any additional names that should be added please let me know and add them to the churn Please let me know ASAP if there are any problems as these churns affect the churns were trying to roll behind Thanks Tammy

FW Tower Space Cc Sally and Brent Just an fyi regarding EGM operations Im looking for space on for the folks with no home The current expectation is the Energy Operations Tower location will be Wed like to have a final meeting with building services to finalize the floor layouts for these two floors during the week of May theyd like us to sign off by May Regards Tammy Original Message From Phillips Cathy Sent Friday April PM To Shepperd Tammy R Subject Tower Space Hi Tammy Please forgive me if this message is redundant but I wanted to make a formal request for space for the Commercial Support functions for Enron Global Markets If possible we would like to have space reserved in the lowest tower floor available since our commercial people will be on the rd floor as you are well aware I am estimating our needs as follows Accounting Personnel with no home on the rd Floor Price Accounting Personnel on rd Floor no future guarantees Price Energy Ops personnel on rd floor no future guarantees Glover Total potential desks needed on tower floor If at all possible I would prefer that a total of desks be held to include space for future growth Thank you for your assistance Cathy Phillips X
Updated ECS floor planning meetingPST When Tuesday January PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ECS
ECS floor planning meetingPST When Tuesday January PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where TBD

Risk OperationsPST All I received a call from Sally Beck today alerting me to concerns about spreading the risk group across the floor gas team power team From a control perspective she prefers that the team be all together Can you factor this in and give Sally and me your thoughts as well Perhaps we could find an area that is more central to both groups that will help with this as weve done with fundies Scott and I are meeting Tuesday afternoon at Lloyd and Sally are you free to join us to keep us all on the same page Please let me know so I can reserve a room Tammy

Commercial estate Cc PST Attached is the th floor excel file to be able to assign seats for the estate churn The churn date will be Thursday Jan Fallons team has asked that the desks be assigned in sequential order Can you guys divide the list and get a churn in by noon tomorrow for the guys I sent you earlier Please They should only be churning phones turrets dont leave the floor CPUs boxes palms etc Key board and mice should remain here If there are any additional names that should be added please let me know and add them to the churn Please let me know ASAP if there are any problems as these churns affect the churns were trying to roll behind Thanks Tammy
th floor planPST Here was the last working doc Thanks much
th floor spreadsheetPST Here you go

RE almost final Cc PST Scott please provide Ina and the assistants with the info they need to start the churns They must be submitted by NOON today I have to meet with the move team to work the timing issues The trading simulation is already at risk as all commercial people may not be relocated by Thurs Thanks Tammy Original Message From Neal Scott Sent Thursday January AM To Shepperd Tammy R Subject RE almost final Tammy I will have final for you by am Bob is working on his supoort people right now and we will be meeting to allocateplace assistants at am I will send shortly thereafter Scott Original Message From Shepperd Tammy R Sent Wednesday January PM To Neal Scott Cc Rangel Ina Subject almost final Importance High Scott Attached is the file with Lavos changes Note hes added a couple of interest rate desks and put gas weather and another fundies person in Bob Superty was looking for logistics support people that should be on the floor Tammy Jaquet Richard Pinion and Natalie Baker Please assign them and the assistants a desk We are out of time on turning this churn in I must have it by noon I will be meeting with the move team tomorrow afternoon to set move dates Im being asked about the trading simulation for next week and since your churns arent set I cant provide an answer Ina please pull in whomever you need to work on the churn be sure and get with Supertys asst to help you with those people etc Regards Tammy File th floorplan xls

almost final Cc PST Scott Attached is the file with Lavos changes Note hes added a couple of interest rate desks and put gas weather and another fundies person in Bob Superty was looking for logistics support people that should be on the floor Tammy Jaquet Richard Pinion and Natalie Baker Please assign them and the assistants a desk We are out of time on turning this churn in I must have it by noon I will be meeting with the move team tomorrow afternoon to set move dates Im being asked about the trading simulation for next week and since your churns arent set I cant provide an answer Ina please pull in whomever you need to work on the churn be sure and get with Supertys asst to help you with those people etc Regards Tammy
RE floor planPST Where are all the assistants sitting Original Message From Neal Scott Sent Wednesday January AM To Shepperd Tammy R Subject floor plan waiting on Hunter File th floorplan zxls

Office Locations Cc Here are the office locations that Louise has assigned Calger Presto Shively T Jae it was decided today that legal will move over here this weekend Can you please arrange for Kevins things to be boxed up so legal can move in downstairs over the weekend Ina if there are any of John Arnolds personal effects left on can you please have them boxed up If we can hold off until next week to set the new offices up Im sure that Darren and David would be very grateful Thanks for your help Tammy Original Message From Rode Tina Sent Monday February PM To Shepperd Tammy R Subject Office for Chris Calger Tammy Chris indicated on Friday that he has an office on this floor Please let me know the location so I can have his office set up at a later date Thanking you in advance Tina Rode Assistant to Chris Calger Cell

Office Locations Cc PST Here are the office locations that Louise has assigned Calger Presto Shively T Jae it was decided today that legal will move over here this weekend Can you please arrange for Kevins things to be boxed up so legal can move in downstairs over the weekend Ina if there are any of John Arnolds personal effects left on can you please have them boxed up If we can hold off until next week to set the new offices up Im sure that Darren and David would be very grateful Thanks for your help Tammy Original Message From Rode Tina Sent Monday February PM To Shepperd Tammy R Subject Office for Chris Calger Tammy Chris indicated on Friday that he has an office on this floor Please let me know the location so I can have his office set up at a later date Thanking you in advance Tina Rode Assistant to Chris Calger Cell
Updated ECS floor planning meetingPST When Tuesday January PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ECS
ECS floor planning meetingPST When Tuesday January PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where TBD

RE Seating QuestionPST Attached is the latest update for the th floor Hope this looks as you expected Regards Tammy Original Message From White Stacey W Sent Wednesday January PM To Shepperd Tammy R Cc Hennessy Sonia Gossett Jeffrey C Subject Seating Question I just heard a rumor that the Ercot Power Trading was going to sit in the Gas Open section Is this the case and does it change the seating for gas and power risk Thanks Stacey

th and th floor layouts Cc PST Attached are the excel floor plans with this mornings information Please utilize these as a working tool to put names on seats Hopefully Presto and Lavorato will not make major changes to the layout Operations on the th floor are between and Please phone me with any questions Regards Tammy x
